well you know . Again Thank You ")

Thank You for your comment. It is not my intent to take away or add to the Bible. What I'm sharing is all there for the reader to read. All it takes is some effort to find the truth. Don't take my word- Search this study for proof that I'm wrong. Don't be surprised if some of the answers you find aren't accepted in this world.
